mapper.select: select LIGHT_IN light, WATER_QLTY ph, WATER_LV Fishbowl, TEMPERATURE temper, date_format(CREATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d') date, date_format(CREATED_AT, '%T') time FROM wt_sensor order by CREATED_AT DESC
select LIGHT_IN light, date_format(CREATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d') date, date_format(CREATED_AT, '%T') time FROM wt_sensor order by CREATED_AT DESC
select WATER_QLTY ph, date_format(CREATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d') date, date_format(CREATED_AT, '%T') time FROM wt_sensor order by CREATED_AT DESC
select WATER_LV Fishbowl, date_format(CREATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d') date, date_format(CREATED_AT, '%T') time FROM wt_sensor order by CREATED_AT DESC
select TEMPERATURE temper, date_format(CREATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d') date, date_format(CREATED_AT, '%T') time FROM wt_sensor order by CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wt_sensor(LIGHT_IN, WATER_QLTY, WATER_LV, TEMPERATURE, CREATED_AT) VALUES(#{light}, #{ph}, #{Fishbowl}, #{temper}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT format(AVG(WATER_QLTY), 3) ph, format(AVG(TEMPERATURE), 3) temper, DATE_FORMAT(CREATED_AT, "%Y-%m-%d %H:00") created_at FROM wt_sensor GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(CREATED_AT, "%Y-%m-%d %H") ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC limit 6
